titles.title: To clarify the tariff classification of certain organo-phosphorous compounds and preparations thereof.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the provision of duties on: (1) n-(phosphonomethyl) glycine, including preparations containing such compound; (2) phosphonomethyliminodiacetic acid; and (3) aminomethane phosphonic acid and their salts and esters.
